price: ߒ߬ߓߵߊߟߊ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߡߐ߱ ߟߎ߫ ߕߐ߬ߢߍ߰ ߟߊ߫ ߝߏߦߌ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߘߋ߬ ߸ ߡߐ߱ ߟߎ߫ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߖߍ߬ߘߍ߫ ߕߐ߬ߢߍ߰ ߟߊ߫
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَظۡلِمُ ٱلنَّاسَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha lā yaẓlimu al-nāsa shayan walākinna al-nāsa anfusahum yaẓlimūna
